slides.title: The Content Problem

content.headline: You Know You Should Post More
content.visual: Empty content calendar with question marks

slides.narration: You know you should post more. Social media, blog posts, email newsletters, announcements—everyone says you need content. But who has the time? You're running a business. The content falls off. Then the visibility drops. It's a vicious cycle. What if there was another way?

slides.title: AI Writes. You Approve.

content.headline: The New Content Model

flow.action: AI drafts content based on your business

content.result: Consistent content without the time drain

slides.narration: Here's the new model. AI drafts content based on your business—you do nothing. You review it in two minutes—quick scan. Click approve or make quick edits—one click. Content publishes automatically—you do nothing. The result: consistent content without the time drain. You stay visible without becoming a full-time content creator.

slides.title: What AI Can Create

content.headline: AI Creates All Types of Content

slides.narration: AI can create all types of content. Social posts—daily, two-minute review. Blog articles—weekly, five minutes to review. Email newsletters—weekly or monthly, five minutes. Announcements, event descriptions, service descriptions—as needed, quick review. The AI adapts to your voice, your business, your audience. You just approve or adjust.

slides.title: Consistency Beats Perfection
slides.narration: Here's the secret nobody tells you: consistency beats perfection. Two perfect posts per month reaches maybe two hundred people. The algorithm punishes inconsistency. Twenty good posts per month reaches two thousand people. The algorithm rewards consistency. Ten times the reach. Probably the same total effort. You don't need perfect content. You need present content.

slides.title: How AI Learns Your Voice

content.headline: AI Sounds Like You (Not a Robot)

training.learns: What you like and don't like

content.result: Content that sounds authentically like your business

slides.narration: But does AI content sound robotic? Not anymore. AI learns your voice from your website—your terminology, services, approach. From past content—your tone and style. From your feedback—what you like and don't like. From industry context—what resonates in your field. After a few rounds of feedback, AI produces content that sounds authentically like your business. Not generic. Not robotic. Yours.

slides.title: The Business That Posts Every Day

case_study.after: Daily posts, 10 minutes/week total on content
case_study.quote: I finally feel like we have a real social media presence without hiring anyone.

slides.narration: Real example. A boutique fitness studio. Before: one to two posts a month, constantly stressed about content. After enabling AI content: daily posts, ten minutes per week total on content. Result: social following grew three hundred forty percent, inquiries up sixty-seven percent. The owner said: 'I finally feel like we have a real social media presence without hiring anyone.'
